column2:
Intro Paragraph: Certified Divorce Specialist April Meyer and her team simplify complex family law matters — from custody and divorce to guardianship and support.
Experience peace of mind knowing your family’s future is protected.
column3:
Divorce can be one of the most difficult transitions in life. At TDE Family Law & Divorce Attorneys, our team provides clear legal guidance and strong advocacy to help you protect what matters most your future, your finances, and your family.

From filing through final resolution, we support you with experience, discretion, and confidence.
